name: Elegant MicroWeb
tag_list: software-development, software-development-india, offshore-software-development, software-programming-india, content-management-systems, cms, software-programming, software-products-development, web, portal, custom-software-development, software-products-
overview: Elegant MicroWeb is an ISO 9001:2000 certified Software Products and Services company based in India with more than ten years of experience offering software development India, outsourcing, offshore software development, application maintenance and support, software products development, IT Staff Augmentation services and other software services. We design portals and content management systems (CMS). Our products include business intelligence (BI) and corporate performance management (CPM), a school management system, a time table system, and Java development tools and libraries.
